body.name: Mini Portable Washing Machine, Foldable Mini Washer Machine, Collapsible Underwear Washing Machine, Portable Clothes Washer, Portable Washer and Dryer Combo for Apartments, Camping, Travel.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 8 hrs 1 min
features: 【Portable Washer and Dryer Combo】- Our portable washing machine is integrated with washing and drying, multipurpose, small in size, fully functional. Ideal for cleaning lightweight clothing that requires separate cleaning, such as baby clothing, underwear, towels, socks, or other small items.

【Foldable Washing Machine】 - Our mini washing machine adopts a foldable design, press down folding, lightweight, easy to move, easy to store in a small space, ideal for camping, vacation, business travel, apartments, dormitories, and won't take up too much space. Unfolded dimensions are 11.5 x 11.5 x 11 inches and folded dimensions are 11.5 x 11.5 x 5 inches.

【3 Modes & Easy to Use】 - Our portable washer offers 3 modes - 5-minute quick wash, 10-minute deep wash, and 2-minute spin-dry. With a one-button design, simply long press the power button for 2 seconds to start or stop, and lightly touch the button to select your preferred mode.
【Removable Spin-dry Basket】 - After Washing Clothes, easily install the draining basket and use it with the washing machine's spin-dry mode to automatically separate residual water from clothes.
【6.5L Large Capacity】 - Our small washing machine has a spacious 6.5L capacity, allowing it to easily hold 3 bras, 6 pairs of socks, 3 towels, 6 pairs of underwear, 3 baby clothes.

【High Power & Efficient Cleaning】 - Equipped with high power and sufficient torque, our Mini Washer machine utilizes high-speed water flow generated by the wave wheel to simulate the tumbling and kneading action of human hands. This ensures effective stain removal and gentle care for clothing fibers.
【Upgrade Durable Material】 - Our portable washer and spin dryer are made of upgraded TRP material, which is more resistant to aging, yellowing, high temperature, and corrosion.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Save space: Folding design can save storage space.Save time: It only takes about 10 minutes to wash the items.Low noise: Low noise won't disturb your work and sleep.Easy to use: Just one touching button to control the portable washing machine.Portable handle: With portable handle, easy to use during travel or any occasion.Blue light sterilization: Suitable for washing underwear or baby clothes, ensure the health of your family.Anti-slip suction cups: Four powerful anti-slip suction cups make the washer more stable during washing.

Our Portable Laundry Machines Can Help You with These Laundry Scenarios Socks piled up, no time to wash themBaby clothes that need to be washed separatelyHouse space is too small and the environment does not allowUnderwear and underpants that you don't want to hand wash

High Power Motor High torque, fast speed, driving the washing rhythm of the wave wheel, more powerful cleaning, stubborn stains without residue. Removable Drainage Basket Automatically separate residual moisture from laundry, gently drain to avoid pulling and deforming laundry. Upgrade Concealed Drains Upgraded drain does not take up extra space, no need to manually pour water, automatic drainage after washing.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS Washing Time 5 MINS / 10MINS Spin-dry Time 3 MINS Rated Voltage 110V-220V Rated Power 30W Capacity 6.5L Weight 4.5LBS Folded Size 11.5*11.5*5 Inches Unfolded Size 11.5*11.5*11 Inches
Package Includes: 1 * Portable Washer Machine1 * Washer Adapter1 * Drain Basket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the apartments
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchase this portable washing machine, and this is perfect for my use. I wanted something for small load like kitchen napkins, small rags and delicate undergarments. It can wash around 3 to 4 kitchen napkins at a time. I have used it for 4 times now and I must say I very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to take it anywhere with you. I clean pretty mich any clothes, shoes, and garment. Works on color, and white. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It has been great for small items for my patents in their apartment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable washing machine.
reviews.reviewText: So got this for my aged aunt that lives in a home and hates putting her under garments in the public wash. So she was washing by hand! Now she absolutely LOVES this washing machine. It's perfect for little wash only! Like a few rags and and her bras and he intimates. You mught have to ring it out a little by hand or put them in a rack. But it's convenient, simple to use. She keeps it not collapsed so not to wear it out.
